io.micronaut.cache.hazelcast

Class HazelcastMemberConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.config.Config
      • io.micronaut.cache.hazelcast.HazelcastMemberConfiguration

  • @ConfigurationProperties(value="hazelcast",
                         includes={"properties","licenseKey","instanceName"})
 @Requires(condition=HazelcastConfigResourceCondition.class) @Requires(missingBeans=com.hazelcast.config.Config.class) @Requires(missingProperty="hazelcast.client")
public class HazelcastMemberConfiguration
extends com.hazelcast.config.Config
    Configuration class for an Hazelcast as a member.
    Since:
    1.0.0
